DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study specifically investigate efficacy alternative pharmacologic cervical ripening agent , misoprostol , versus standard oxytocin , adjunct Foley balloon induction unfavorable cervix .
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Ripening Induction Labor : Misoprostol Versus Oxytocin Conjunction With Foley Balloon
DOC.detailed_description: The design study randomize , control study two arm . Both group undergo placement Foley catheter , external internal o cervix , accord standard practice . In group A , receive intravenous infusion oxytocin , serve control group standard protocol Aultman Hospital . Group B , intravaginal placement misoprostol , serve experimental group . The expected duration participation begin induction labor concludes time delivery .
